text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: If only you were here…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I've had that thought so many times.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But I know that you'll always be inside of me, that you'll never disappear.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: That's because even if I can't hear your voice, even if I can't see your body, I can still feel you. I can feel you and your precious thoughts.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Even under this beautiful starry sky, I know you're…

text_block_list.name: PA System
text_block_list.text: We look forward to seeing you again. The next projection will begin at…
The planetarium. I knew she loved the stars, so I came here to learn more so that we would have something to talk about.
I enjoyed it more than I thought I would. I figured this was a good time to learn more about the stars. So I went to the gift shop, looking for some picture books to help my study, when…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I always come here… But why are you here?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Did you come to look at the stars?
Admire Vega asked me a question. It's rare to see her try to have a conversation.
choice_data_list: I thought I'd learn more about the stars.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Why…? Are you interested in the stars?
As expected, the conversation is still going! I can't waste this chance. I need to come up with something witty…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: …What?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Wh-What are you… saying…?
choice_data_list:
Ah, no I meant… 
You know, stars! The stars!

text_block_list.text: In my haste, I ended up saying something weird. I hurriedly corrected myself, stating that "it's because you love the stars."

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Ah… I get it now. Next time think before you speak.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But, just because I love the stars doesn't mean that you have to as well, you know?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I get it. Since you're my trainer, you're trying to meet me halfway, right?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But I don't want that… nor do I need it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I've said this many times before, but I'm fine being alone. I don't need friends, I don't need someone to console me, and I don't need people to be nice to me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Racing and winning are my burdens to bear, no one else's. Moreover, she… my sister…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Died in my place.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: So just stop…
choice_data_list:
I simply and selfishly 
want to get closer to you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Again… with that?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No matter what I say, you continue to reply with the same thing.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm going home…
choice_data_list: Ah, but I figured we could…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You were looking for a book to buy, right?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The one on your right is easy to understand.
Admire Vega said this after noticing the books in my hand. She then quietly walked away without another word.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Why can't I treat her coldly…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I could have been more aggressive… I could have yelled at her to make sure she stayed away.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But to participate in races, I need a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: That's the only thing I need. I know that for a fact. After all, I'm happy being alone.
